forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Partly sunny. High near 74, with temperatures falling to around 71 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Patchy Fog
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 8pm, then patchy fog. Partly cloudy. Low around 55, with temperatures rising to around 57 overnight. West northwest wind 1 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
